title: Bug 45145: Incorrect Window Behavior in Eclipse
description: When working with multiple windows in Eclipse, the second window unexpectedly comes to the front without user intervention.
OB: When navigating through tasks in the primary window, the secondary window pops to the front, interrupting the workflow. It happens intermittently and disrupts the expected flow of work.
EB: The secondary window should remain in the background unless explicitly clicked upon, except in scenarios where user action naturally leads to interaction with elements in the other window.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open two separate windows in Eclipse.
2. Begin performing tasks in the primary window.
3. While actively engaged in the primary window, observe the secondary window unexpectedly gaining focus without direct interaction.
